scripts.ci:e2e-tests: npm run ci:e2e-tests:threejs && npm run ci:e2e-tests:playcanvas
scripts.ci:e2e-tests:threejs: concurrently --success first --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run wait-for-ports && cross-env RENDERER=threejs HEADLESS=true jest --runInBand"
scripts.ci:e2e-tests:playcanvas: concurrently --success first --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run wait-for-ports && cross-env RENDERER=playcanvas HEADLESS=true jest --runInBand"
scripts.ci:e2e-tests:threejs:shard: concurrently --success first --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run wait-for-ports && cross-env RENDERER=threejs HEADLESS=true tsx ./shard-tests.ts"
scripts.ci:e2e-tests:playcanvas:shard: concurrently --success first --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run wait-for-ports && cross-env RENDERER=playcanvas HEADLESS=true tsx ./shard-tests.ts"
scripts.e2e-tests: npm run e2e-tests:threejs:shard && npm run e2e-tests:playcanvas:shard
scripts.e2e-tests:threejs: npm run wait-for-ports && cross-env RENDERER=threejs HEADLESS=false jest --runInBand
scripts.e2e-tests:playcanvas: npm run wait-for-ports && cross-env RENDERER=playcanvas HEADLESS=false jest --runInBand
scripts.e2e-tests:threejs:shard: npm run wait-for-ports && cross-env RENDERER=threejs HEADLESS=false tsx ./shard-tests.ts
scripts.e2e-tests:playcanvas:shard: npm run wait-for-ports && cross-env RENDERER=playcanvas HEADLESS=false tsx ./shard-tests.ts
scripts.e2e-tests:failed: npm run e2e-tests:threejs:failed && npm run e2e-tests:playcanvas:failed
scripts.e2e-tests:threejs:failed: npm run wait-for-ports && cross-env RENDERER=threejs HEADLESS=false jest --runInBand --onlyFailures
scripts.e2e-tests:playcanvas:failed: npm run wait-for-ports && cross-env RENDERER=playcanvas HEADLESS=false jest --runInBand --onlyFailures
